description: This is a Flutter widget source file defining the MatchesScreen class, which displays a UI with messages indicating no current matches and instructions to the user.

classes.name: MatchesScreen
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that builds a user interface indicating no current matches and guiding users to use filters.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the widget tree for the MatchesScreen, including a scroll view with a SliverAppBar, informational message, and prompts to the user.
